sentences.en: Always do right. This will gratify some people and astonish the rest.
sentences.cn: 坚持做正确的事. 这会让一些人满意,让其他人惊奇.

sentences.en: But IP adderss of weii - formed cannot gratify demand of inflate development in internet.
sentences.cn: 但合法的IP地址对膨胀式Internet的发展已经不能满足要求.

sentences.en: Dant è s must be crushed to gratify Villefort's ambition.
sentences.cn: 但他仍不肯让步,在维尔福的野心的重压之下,唐太斯是必须被摧毁的.
你就满足一下我们的好奇心吧.

sentences.en: Folly and idleness often contrive to gratify pride at a cheaper rate.
sentences.cn: 愚蠢和懒散,经常在廉价方面得到自豪的满足.

sentences.en: He couldn't gratify his own passion.
sentences.cn: 他无法满足自己的情欲.

sentences.en: He did that to gratify his girlfriend's vanity.
sentences.cn: 他做那事是要满足他女友的虚荣心.
他对每一种异想天开感到满意.

sentences.en: He was gratified by Lucy’s response.
sentences.cn: 他对露西的回答很满意。

sentences.en: It will gratify you to see how much your services are valued.
sentences.cn: 火星会令你看到自己的服务是多麽有意义的,你会感到满意.

sentences.en: Never put on false masks to gratify your vanity.
sentences.cn: 永远不要带着假面具去满足你的虚荣心.

sentences.en: She dilated on the beauty of the park and the Hall to gratify him.
sentences.cn: 她不断地夸奖园林和府第的美丽,让他高兴.

sentences.en: She only wanted to gratify her own desire for attention.
sentences.cn: 她只想满足自己引入注目的欲望.

sentences.en: To gratify my curiosity, do tell me what it be.
sentences.cn: 为满足我的好奇心, 你一定得告诉我那是什麽.

sentences.en: You have roused my curiosity. And now you must gratify it.
sentences.cn: 你现在已经激起我的好奇心了, 那现在你别在卖关子了.
你的好评使我非常高兴.

words.tran_cn: 令人满意地；使人满足地
满意；喜悦；使人满意之事
使满足；使高兴（gratify的过去式及过去分词形式）
使满意（gratify的现在分词）；使高兴

trans.tran_en: to make someone feel pleased and satisfied
to make someone feel pleased and satisfied
